item.title: Project Management Coaching
item.description:
Project Management Coaching

Keith Anderson is a Belfast-based certified PRINCE2 Practitioner and provides proven coaching for various Project Management qualifications.

item.title: Documenting how you work
item.description:
Documenting how you work

Agile isn't something you do, it's something you are. It's a broad church. This means that there's a variety of processes and cloud based tools being tried out by groups across the country. As an example of an agile process I use, I've found that it's worth sketching out a lightweight map of how your team is working.

item.title: Agile Delivery in the Travel Beta; from Scrum to Kanban
item.description:
Agile Delivery in the Travel Beta; from Scrum to Kanban

At the end of July 2013, the Travel team in Cardiff breathed a huge sigh of relief as the Travel Beta went live to our audiences and we could finally start to get some feedback on the thing we had been developing for so many months.

item.title: Jeff Veen - Design for Disaster
item.description:
Jeff Veen - Design for Disaster

A while back, Jeff sat on a couch in the Typekit offices, staring out the window, and wondering if everything their company had been working towards was about to slip through their fingers. How that story ends is interesting (spoiler alert: they're still going strong), and Jeff will share lessons on how they got through it and why they were ready for it.

item.title: The Art of Creating Accurate Estimates
item.description:
The Art of Creating Accurate Estimates

Best approaches to developing accurate estimates.
